snippet: ROSEN--Sylvia, February 28, 1914, New York, NY - March 25, 2016 at home in Canton, MA. She is survived by her daughter Carol Kur (Mitchell) and her sons Michael Oliver (Claire), Martin Rosen (Valerie) and Seth Rosen (Joan), nine grandchildren and fifteen great- grandchildren as well as a brother William Ledewitz of New Haven, CT and sisters Shirley Aaronson of New Haven, CT and Pompano Beach, FL and Phyllis Blumberg of Waltham, MA. Married in 1934 to Stewart Oliver (died 1953) and in 1955 to David P. Rosen (died 1995). A longtime resident of New Haven, CT, she spent the last 17 years of her life in Orchard Cove, Canton, MA. Sylvia was an elegant, wise, strong and determined woman, a lover of books and current events who also had a lifelong devotion to Jewish study. She passed on her passion for learning to the generations that followed. A private graveside service was held in East Haven, CT on March 28, 2016. 1/3
